items.sentence: Tom didn\'t believe the rumor about Mary and John.
Tom didn\'t know who Mary was planning to talk to.
Tom doesn\'t go to the same school that Mary does.
Tom must be shown how to do what needs to be done.
Tom must stay in the hospital for at least a week.
Tom needs to hear the bad news directly from Mary.
Tom needs to return this book by tomorrow evening.
Tom never found out the truth about Mary and John.
Tom never found out the truth about what Mary did.
I\'m actually looking forward to seeing Tom again.
I\'m beginning to understand why Tom loves Boston.
I just want to tell Tom before somebody else does.
I just want you to think about me once in a while.
I like to spread honey on my toast in the morning.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve seen my family.
It\'s all right, Tom. Everything\'s all right now.
I\'ve been trying to solve this problem for hours.
I\'ve been very busy since I returned from abroad.
I\'ve got two hours to finish writing this report.
Tom wasn\'t satisfied with the pay he was getting.
You\'re twice as smart as anyone else in the room.
I don\'t know whether Tom can speak French or not.
I don\'t know whether Tom will eat with us or not.
I wish I could remember people\'s names and faces.
I wonder what happened at Tom\'s house last night.
Tom doesn\'t seem to want to answer this question.
Tom doesn\'t spend much time thinking about money.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary will do the job very well.
Tom doesn\'t think that Mary made a wise decision.
I just want you to know that I don\'t believe you.
I know it\'s unrealistic to expect Tom to do that.
I\'m afraid I won\'t be able to get there on time.
I\'m convinced that Tom didn\'t do anything wrong.
Tom and Mary took turns taking the dog for a walk.
I wasn\'t able to remember the title of that song.
You thought I wouldn\'t come tonight, didn\'t you?
You\'re not the only one who\'s afraid of heights.
We were late for school because it rained heavily.
When do you think Tom is going to want to do that?
How old were you when you started studying French?
How old were you when your family moved to Boston?
I am not sure, but I think I want to be a teacher.
Something like that wouldn\'t happen in Australia.
Sooner or later, Tom will likely agree to help us.
Tom and Mary are both in Boston now, aren\'t they?
Tom wasn\'t given the chance you and I were given.
Tom wasn\'t sure whether he should do that or not.
Tom wasn\'t the one who convinced Mary to do that.
Tom couldn\'t get Mary to tell him what was wrong.
Tom didn\'t tell anyone why he had gone to Boston.
